 (multipart/alternative) 
Multipart prefix (text/plain) 
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain) 
VIA E-MAIL AND CERTIFIED MAIL 
 
The Planet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
1333 North Stemmons Freeway 
Suite 110 
Dallas, TX 75207 
 
Re:     DMCA Complaint from MOVADO RE:  Sale of Counterfeit MOVADO
watches by 
www.best-replica-watch.com Our Ref: MOVA USA TS-99/11160-007) 
 
Dear Sir or Madam: 
 
We represent the Movado Group of companies ("Movado"), an 
internationally-known manufacturer and seller of high-quality watches.
Our 
client is the exclusive owner of many federally registered trademarks
and 
copyrights in the U.S., as well as in other countries around the world.
These 
include trademark registrations for the marks MOVADO in International
Class 
14 for watches (U.S. Reg. No. 1, 294, 171); for MUSEUM in International
Class 
14 for wrist watches (U.S. Reg. No. 1,114,067); for VIZIO in
International 
Class 14 for watches (U.S. Reg. No. 2,098,170), as well as the MOVADO
Museum 
Watch Design (U.S. Reg. Nos. 1,381,257 and 1,398,457); Movado is also
the 
exclusive licensee of the mark ESQ. for watches (U.S. Reg. No.
1,672,563) 
(collectively the "MOVADO Marks").  Through many years of use,
advertising 
and promotion, the MOVADO Marks have become closely identified with our 
client's business and represent substantial goodwill. 
 
It has recently come to our attention that you provide services to a web
page 
known as www.best-replica-watch.com, which offers for sale counterfeit
and 
infringing watches bearing one or more of the MOVADO Marks, the MOVADO
Museum 
Watch Design, or marks substantially indistinguishable therefrom.  These

items are being offered for sale in violation of federal and state
trademark 
laws as well as related laws of unfair competition, which entitle Movado
to 
extensive remedies, including preliminary and permanent injunctions,
recovery 
of profits, treble damages and attorneys' fees. 
 
The Acceptable Use Policy posted on your web site prohibits trademark 
infringement by your customers and provides you with the power to
terminate 
or suspend services to accounts that violate the policy.  Thus, please 
provide confirmation by January 10, 2007 that you will immediately cease

providing services to the owner of the site until all content relating
to the 
infringing MOVADO watches is removed. 
 
In accordance with your rules regarding Notification of Claimed
Infringement, 
we affirm that our client has a good faith belief that the use of the 
material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the owner and
that 
the information in this notification is accurate.  We also state under 
penalty of perjury that our client is the owner of the exclusive
trademark 
rights the MOVADO mark, which are being infringed. 
 
This letter is without prejudice to our client's rights or remedies, all
of 
which are expressly reserved.   
 
Thank you for your cooperation. 
 
Regards, 
Yvonne Sharpy 
Internet Paralegal 
Fross Zelnick Lehrman & Zissu, P.C. 
866 United Nations Plaza 
New York, NY  10017 
Direct: 212-813-8248 
Fax:  212-813-5901
